/* com.innobiz.orange.web.pt.dao.PtAuthGrpAuthDDao.selectPtAuthGrpAuthD */
SELECT
M.*, CASE WHEN GRP_KND_CD = 'posit' OR GRP_KND_CD = 'grade' OR GRP_KND_CD = 'title' OR GRP_KND_CD = 'role' OR GRP_KND_CD = 'secul' OR GRP_KND_CD = 'duty' OR GRP_KND_CD = 'aduStat' THEN (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = M.RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) WHEN GRP_KND_CD = 'userGrp' THEN (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_D WHERE COMP_ID = M.COMP_ID AND RESC_ID = M.RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) WHEN GRP_KND_CD = 'dept' OR GRP_KND_CD = 'user' THEN (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = M.RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) ELSE '' END RESC_NM,
FROM ( SELECT * FROM (
SELECT
TOP (#{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}) ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ${orderBy}N.COMP_ID DESC, N.AUTH_GRP_ID DESC, N.EXCLI_YN DESC, N.SEQ DESC, N.GRP_KND_CD DESC, N.GRP_ID DESC) AS RNUM, N.* FROM (SELECT
T.COMP_ID, T.AUTH_GRP_ID, T.EXCLI_YN, T.SEQ, T.GRP_KND_CD, T.GRP_ID, T.AUTH_GRP_TYP_CD, T.RESC_ID, T.SUB_INCL_YN, T.SORT_ORDR,
CASE WHEN GRP_KND_CD = 'posit' OR GRP_KND_CD = 'grade' OR GRP_KND_CD = 'title' OR GRP_KND_CD = 'role' OR GRP_KND_CD = 'secul' OR GRP_KND_CD = 'duty' OR GRP_KND_CD = 'aduStat' THEN (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = T.RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) WHEN GRP_KND_CD = 'userGrp' THEN (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_D WHERE COMP_ID = T.COMP_ID AND RESC_ID = T.RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) WHEN GRP_KND_CD = 'dept' OR GRP_KND_CD = 'user' THEN (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = T.RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) ELSE '' END RESC_NM,
FROM PT_AUTH_GRP_AUTH_D T
AND T.COMP_ID = #{compId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.AUTH_GRP_ID = #{authGrpId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.EXCLI_YN = #{excliYn, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.SEQ = #{seq, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND T.GRP_KND_CD = #{grpKndCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.GRP_ID = #{grpId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.AUTH_GRP_TYP_CD = #{authGrpTypCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ${whereSqllet}
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ORDER BY T.COMP_ID, T.AUTH_GRP_ID, T.EXCLI_YN, T.SEQ, T.GRP_KND_CD, T.GRP_ID
) N ) M WHERE RNUM > (#{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} - 1) * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND RNUM <= #{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) M
